title: Chicken and broccoli bake
ingredients: ['6 chicken breast fillets, cut into bite sized pieces', '225ml chicken stock, or as needed', '450g broccoli', '2 (295g) tins condensed mushroom soup', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '200g mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '110g grated Parmesan cheese', '100g dried breadcrumbs']
